channel.title: Chromebook on R15Cookie Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Chromebook on R15Cookie Blog

item.description: {% include JB/setup %} I’m still compiling my large list of tasks, and hope to break them out blog posts/wiki documents. But the coolest thing I’ve come across so far is that the Chromebook can open up Rar files! Rar compressed files are not too common, but nice to know it’s one less item I’ll have to depend on another machine to perform.
